 ) } const CardFunding = (props) => { let detail = props.detail let onCardClick = props.onCardClick let { fundingAddress, manager, projectName, targetMoney, supportMoney, leftTime, balance, investorCount } = detail let percent = parseFloat(balance) / parseFloat(targetMoney) * 100 return ( onCardClick(detail)}> {projectName} 剩余时间:1 进度:{percent} 项目描述
